RegexExtractVariable.name: conf_out2
RegexExtractVariable.matchPattern: (service timestamps log datetime localtime show-timezone|logging facility local7|logging trap informational|logging 10.68.34.193|logging 10.80.11.81)(.*)

RegexExtractVariable.name: config_out
RegexExtractVariable.matchPattern: (service timestamps log datetime localtime show-timezone|logging facility local7|logging trap informational|logging 10.68.34.193|logging 10.80.11.81)(.*)

EditVariableAction.script: sys2chk='No'; sys2chk;
sys1chk='No'; sys1chk;
deviceip = affected_host; deviceip;
var final_output=deviceip + ',' + devicehostname + ',' + cmdb_tier + ',' + config_issue + ',' + sys1chk + ',' + sys2chk + "\n"; final_output;
connect_error="Situation - Automation not possible. Cannot login to endpoint - password not accepted."; connect_error;
connect_error="Situation - Automation not possible. Cannot connect to Jumphost."; connect_error;
final_output=deviceip + ',' + devicehostname + ',' + cmdb_tier + '-,-,-,Could not connect to syslog server2.' + connect_error + "\n"; final_output;
final_output=deviceip + ',' + devicehostname + ',' + cmdb_tier + '-,-,-,Could not connect to syslog server1.' + connect_error + "\n"; final_output;
sys1chk='No'; sys1chk;
final_output=deviceip + ',' + devicehostname + ',' + cmdb_tier + '-,-,-,Could not connect to syslog server1.' + connect_error + "\n"; final_output;
var final_output=deviceip + ',' + devicehostname + ',' + cmdb_tier + ',' + config_issue + ',' + sys1chk + ',' + sys2chk + "\n"; final_output;
conf_out2 = conf_out2.replace(devicehostname, ""); conf_out2;
final_output=deviceip + ',' + devicehostname + ',' + cmdb_tier + '-,-,-,Could not connect to syslog server2.' + connect_error + "\n"; final_output;
connect_error=deviceip + ',' + devicehostname + ',-' + '-,-,-,Situation - Automation not possible. Device not in IPcmdb or not active.' + "\n"; connect_error;
connect_error='Lookup error: hostname_from_event <> hostname_from_device.'; connect_error;
final_output;
sys2chk='No'; sys2chk;
final_output=deviceip + ',' + devicehostname + ',' + cmdb_tier + '-,-,-,Could not connect to networkdevice.' + connect_error + "\n"; final_output;
config_out = config_out.replace(devicehostname,''); config_out;
connect_error="Situation - Automation not possible. Cannot connect to endpoint."; connect_error;
config_issue = 'KO'; config_issue;
device_name1;
deviceip;
config_issue = 'KO'; config_issue;
final_output=deviceip + ',' + devicehostname + ',' + cmdb_tier + ',-,-,-,' + connect_error + "\n"; final_output;

HostCommandAction.command: logger -p local0.error 'DANWLO2 - Log messages for device ${devicehostname} not received by syslog servers' &
logger -p local0.warning 'DANWLO1 - Non-standard logging configuration on device ${devicehostname}' &
service timestamps log datetime localtime show-timezone

EditVariableAction.script: error = "Success - " + devicehostname + " found active in cmdb. Further action will be taken by automata.\n"; error;

EmailAction.body: ${error}

NormalState.name: Not active or found in cmdb

automaton.approvalNotes: Change no: 649053 for resetting password of IPAutomata and Admin in Locksmith
automaton.name: IPlockmith v2.1

EmailAction.subject: subject

automaton.approvalNotes:
devops : As part of the defect in CPU aggregate high handler and as it was in staged stage , sending for approval.
devops for the CPU aggregate high handler. https://hub.jazz.net/ccm06/quickplanner/jazzhub.html#items:projectId=_F_H7VnfoEeSi-OIwg-tlIA&serverId=hub.jazz.net&planType=mywork&allIterations=true&itemId=32014
automaton.name: SIA:UNIX:GEN:R:C: Unix Connection Broker [With Id Redundancy]
automaton.notes: Connection Broker specific to SIA. This will login to the IPcenter Unix jumpbox and then ssh to the endpoint using a ssh key with passphrase.

EditVariableAction.script: connect_error="Issue - Unable to connect to server" + "\n"; connect_error;
connect_error="Issue - Cannot connect to jumphost" +"\n"; connect_error;
connect_error="Issue - No passphrase prompt for both ipat ids" + "\n"; connect_error;
connect_error="Issue - One or both ipat ids locked" + "\n"; connect_error;
connect_error="Issue - Unable to SUDO" + "\n"; connect_error;
connect_error="Issue - Cannot connect using both the ipat ID's - possible missing ssh key" + "\n"; connect_error;

EmailAction.subject: ATTN: ${lsFolderName} : In jumpbox ${affected_host} as both ipat id's are locked.
ATTN: ${lsFolderName}: cannot get ${affected_host} - using both both the ipat ID's. - possible missing ssh key
ATTN: ${lsFolderName} : In jumpbox but cannot get to ${affected_host}
ATTN: ${lsFolderName} : cannot connect to ${affected_host} using both ipat id's

EmailAction.body:
ATTN: ${lsFolderName}: Cannot get to jumpbox while trying to get to "${affected_host}"
Sent by ${automaton.name}
EmailAction.subject: ATTN: ${lsFolderName}: Cannot connect to jumpbox
ATTN: ${lsFolderName} - cannot sudo to ${affected_host}

automaton.name: SIA:NTW:D:C:Connection Broker [No email]
automaton.notes: Connection broker to pull Network ID and password from IPLocksmith. Please note that it uses encrypted password to submit on network device for logging in through ssh.. 13Nov2015-Update: No email functionality, updated with siaipat2 id login.

EditVariableAction.script: connect_error="Situation - In jumpbox but cannot get to "+ affected_host +" as ssh is still asking for password"; connect_error;
connect_error="Situation - Cannot get to jumpbox while trying to get to "+ affected_host; connect_error;
connect_error="Situation - In jumpbox but cannot get to "+ affected_host; connect_error;
